metadataDescription: Stay organized with less effort and get more done. Download Blotz on iOS and Android today!
subtitleLine1: A task manager designed for ADHD users
subtitleLine2: Stay organized with less effort and get more done
ctaLine: Try the beta on iOS and Android today!
whyBlotzSubtitle: We built Blotz specifically to help neurodivergent minds stay on track without the overwhelm.
benefit1Desc: Just talk to Blotz. We'll turn your scattered thoughts into organized tasks.
benefit2Desc: Large tasks are automatically split into manageable steps to reduce procrastination.
benefit3Desc: A clean, high-contrast interface designed to minimize cognitive load and distractions.
finalCtaSub: Join thousands of users improving their focus with Blotz.
